name: Tommy Hilfiger Adaptive
description: Classic American clothing with magnetic closures, seated-friendly fits, and adaptive features.

name: No Limbits
description: Modern adaptive clothing for amputees, wheelchair users, sensory needs, and limited dexterity.

name: Joe & Bella
description: Adaptive clothing focused on aging adults and mobility limitations with easy-dress designs.

name: MagnaReady
description: Magnetic-closure apparel for individuals with limited mobility and dexterity.

name: Seven7 Adaptive
description: Adaptive denim with stretch material, velcro/magnet options and comfort while seated.

name: Zappos Adaptive
description: Adaptive shoes and clothing designed for convenience and sensory comfort.

name: Adidas Seated Line
description: Athletic clothing designed specifically for seated athletes including wheelchair basketball.

name: Friendly Shoes
description: Easy-entry shoes with zipper systems for people with low dexterity.

name: Nike FlyEase
description: Adaptive shoes and apparel featuring hands-free entry, collapsible heels, and accessible closures.

name: JCPenney - Jamey Perry
description: Wheelchair-friendly clothing designed for seated wear, sensory comfort, and easy dressing.

name: Buck & Buck
description: Adaptive underwear and clothing designed for mobility limits and personal care needs.

name: Vans Adaptive
description: Soft-insole, sensory-friendly shoes and tees (limited continuation).
